critique: The document expresses strong disapproval and concern regarding the actions of the previous administration. It conveys a sense of injustice and a determination to correct past misconduct. The language used is formal and legalistic, but the underlying emotions are palpable. It expresses anger and disgust at the weaponization of federal agencies, fear for the erosion of democratic processes, and a sense of surprise at the extent of the alleged abuses. There is little joy or sadness expressed in the document.
